about_the_game:
Make Words

Longer words score higher, but specific combos can turn short words into powerhouses. Not happy with your hand? Discard any number of letters, up to four times each round.

Build your Deck

Add enhanced letter cards to supercharge your score. Delete difficult letters to improve your odds of drawing the ones you want.

Deploy Feathers to Change the Game

Feathers aren’t just bonuses. They transform how words are scored, making some patterns incredibly potent.

Try Wild Strategies

With more than six million possible combinations of feathers, along with enhanced letters and transformative songs, there’s no limit to the strategies you can try. How about two-letter words with enhanced letters left in your hand? It could work!

Lead your Flock to Safety

Birdigo consists of migrations with dozens of stopovers — each one a chance to replenish and re-strategize. To reach the next one, you’ll need to fly further each round.

Generate Epic High Scores

Achievements unlock new feathers, songs, decks, and migration routes. Huge bonuses and multipliers mean big numbers, which you’ll need to win these treacherous routes.

Play It Safe — or Go for Broke!

Should you play that easy word, or discard some letters in the hopes of drawing something better? Which feather should you pick? Which song? Your choices are the difference between a successful migration and failure.
